<h3 id="X34628">X(34628) = CENTER OF THE HR-ELLIPSE OF THESE TRIANGLES: OUTER-GARCIA TO ABC-X3 REFLECTIONS</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 11*a^4-3*(b+c)*a^3-(7*b^2-6*b*c+7*c^2)*a^2+3*(b-c)*(b^2-c^2)*a-4*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(34628) = 3*X(1)-4*X(3655) = 5*X(1)-4*X(3656) = 7*X(1)-4*X(12699) = X(1)-4*X(18481) = 4*X(2)-5*X(7987) = 8*X(2)-7*X(7989) = 5*X(2)-4*X(19925) = 4*X(3)-3*X(19875) = 2*X(4)-3*X(25055) = 4*X(4)-5*X(30308) = 4*X(4)-7*X(30389) = 2*X(10)-3*X(10304) = 6*X(25055)-5*X(30308) = 6*X(25055)-7*X(30389) = 5*X(30308)-7*X(30389)</b>
<p>
The center of the reciprocal HR-ellipse of these triangles is X(34627)</p>
<p>X(34628) lies on these lines:
{1,30}, {2,4297}, {3,19875}, {4,25055}, {10,10304}, {20,519}, {40,3534}, {98,9875}, {165,376}, {355,8703}, {381,3576}, {390,9814}, {484,7171}, {516,3241}, {517,15681}, {528,2951}, {529,34701}, {535,5538}, {542,34714}, {549,5587}, {550,3654}, {551,1699}, {553,3486}, {631,30315}, {944,11001}, {946,15682}, {952,15686}, {971,31165}, {1125,3839}, {1155,30286}, {1385,3830}, {1420,11238}, {1482,15685}, {1657,7982}, {1698,3524}, {1750,11113}, {2093,4316}, {2094,24645}, {2784,8591}, {3091,19883}, {3146,11522}, {3339,4299}, {3361,10572}, {3488,30350}, {3522,9588}, {3529,5882}, {3545,3624}, {3579,4668}, {3584,5726}, {3586,10072}, {3600,30343}, {3601,11237}, {3627,9624}, {3632,31730}, {3633,6361}, {3634,15708}, {3653,3845}, {3828,15692}, {3851,31666}, {3897,15679}, {3928,10085}, {3929,10864}, {4293,10980}, {4294,30337}, {4298,15933}, {4301,5059}, {4302,9819}, {4305,5290}, {4325,6869}, {4512,15677}, {4669,12512}, {4870,12943}, {4995,9578}, {5054,18480}, {5055,13624}, {5071,10165}, {5073,15178}, {5234,17647}, {5250,15678}, {5252,31508}, {5270,6851}, {5298,9581}, {5531,6282}, {5603,28172}, {5690,15690}, {5727,15326}, {5732,17579}, {5790,14093}, {5818,15698}, {5886,15687}, {5901,33699}, {6684,19708}, {6987,30326}, {7580,11194}, {7688,18519}, {7753,9592}, {7967,28150}, {7994,34618}, {8273,16857}, {8666,33557}, {8726,28452}, {9590,15078}, {9613,10056}, {9615,13846}, {9619,14537}, {9626,18324}, {9778,28236}, {9780,15705}, {9902,33706}, {9956,15693}, {10031,13253}, {10106,10385}, {10175,15702}, {10246,15684}, {10247,28154}, {10299,31399}, {10442,17378}, {10711,15015}, {10723,12258}, {10860,34626}, {10902,28444}, {11231,15700}, {11362,17538}, {12100,31423}, {12117,13174}, {12407,20126}, {13464,33703}, {14269,33697}, {15622,19254}, {15688,18525}, {15691,28224}, {15694,17502}, {15695,31663}, {15709,19872}, {15931,16418}, {16191,28178}, {16200,28146}, {17504,18357}, {17613,34717}, {17800,24680}, {19924,34674}, {26446,34200}, {28458,30503}, {31425,33923}</p>
<p>
X(34628) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {944, 11001}, {1482, 15685}, {3241, 15683}<br>
X(34628) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (2, 4297), (40, 3534), (355, 8703), (1699, 5731), (3543, 551), (3654, 550), (3679, 376), (3830, 1385), (3928, 34620), (4669, 12512), (4677, 40), (5690, 15690), (5691, 2), (5881, 3654), (9875, 98), (9902, 33706), (10723, 12258), (12407, 20126), (13174, 12117), (13253, 10031), (15682, 946), (31162, 3655), (33699, 5901), (34632, 34638)<br>
X(34628) = anticomplement of X(34648)<br>
X(34628) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 25055, 30308), (79, 15174, 10910), (1081, 3649, 11544), (3655, 31162, 1), (4297, 5691, 7987), (4654, 32047, 18990), (5434, 9579, 13408), (5691, 7987, 7989), (7354, 13995, 11544), (9611, 31162, 79), (12696, 16155, 18506), (13408, 15171, 1), (22791, 34657, 31162), (30308, 30389, 25055), (34634, 34712, 1)<br>
</p>
